mods.note: No Prokofiev works on this program, which included the premiere of Ludi Leopoldini by Gottfied von Einem, as well as Mozart's Symphony No. 36 and Brahms' Symphony No. 4. Program notes by France-Yvonne Bril. The program does include an announcement at the end about two Prokofiev concerts: One by the Orchestre National de France under Gunther Schuller on 10/31/1980 (marked as "cancelled" in pen in this program) and antoher by the Orchestre du Gewandhaus de Leipzig under Kurt Masur on 11/20/1980.

Program also included Mozart's Sinfonia Concertante in E-flat K 297b. The inside cover includes a short note to Lina Prokofiev signed 'Erik.' Notes by Reinhard Schuz, Israil Nest'ev, Karl-Robert Danler, and Hartmut Becker.
